functionEntry.name: initialize
functionEntry.documentation:
Creates a new Logger object.
logLevel [Toybox::Lang::String] The log level value to log messages through this class to

logStream [Toybox::Lang::Object] An object which defines a println(message) function

functionEntry.name: <globals/LogBarrel/Logger/<>formLogMessage>
functionEntry.documentation:
Forms a log message based on the given values.
tag [Toybox::Lang::String] The tag to apply to the log message

message [Toybox::Lang::String] The message to log

Returns [Toybox::Lang::String] A log message matching the format specified by FORMAT_TIMESTAMP

functionEntry.name: <globals/LogBarrel/Logger/<>log>
functionEntry.documentation:
Handles the printing of a log message to the log file
tag [Toybox::Lang::String] The tag to apply to the log message

message [Toybox::Lang::String] The message to log

functionEntry.name: <globals/LogBarrel/Logger/<>getVariableType>
functionEntry.documentation:
Returns the type string of the given variable. Note, this function
will currently only return names within the Toybox.Lang module. If the
given variable isn't a type defined there then "Object" will be returned.
variable [Toybox::Lang::Object] The variable to get the type of

Returns [Toybox::Lang::String] The name of the type of the given variable

functionEntry.name: logMessage
functionEntry.documentation:
Log the given message under the given tag
tag [Toybox::Lang::String] The tag to apply to the log message

message [Toybox::Lang::String] The message to log

functionEntry.name: logException
functionEntry.documentation:
Log the given Exception under the given tag
tag [Toybox::Lang::String] The tag to apply to the log message

exception [Toybox::Lang::Exception] The Exception to log

functionEntry.name: logVariable
functionEntry.documentation:
Log the given variable's information under the given tag
tag [Toybox::Lang::String] The tag to apply to the log message

variableName [Toybox::Lang::String] The name of the variable being logged

variable [Toybox::Lang::Object] The variable to log
